description: This file serves as the main entry point for a Flutter application called 'Personal Notes'. It sets up the application with theme, routing, and state management, and includes placeholder screens and stub database/provider implementations.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up theme, routing, and state management for the app.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget representing the notes list screen.

classes.name: _NotFoundScreen
classes.description: Screen displayed when a route is not found.

classes.name: NotesDb
classes.description: Stub class representing a database connection and initialization.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: Stub class for state management of notes, to be implemented later.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, database, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class defining its UI.
